title: It’s New 2/10: ChatGPT Ads now live, Grokipedia dropping and Google Ads
channel: RustyBrick Barry Schwartz Search Engine Roundtable
description:
Today we covered ChatGPT Ads going live. There is more Google ranking volatility.  Grokipedia is dropping in the Google search results.  And Google Ads PMax A/B experiments rolling out. Google is now testing citation icons on the bottom of the AI Mode responses.

0:00 - Introduction
0:25 - ChatGPT Ads go live with user controls
2:07 - Google ranking volatility heats up
2:29 - Grokipedia see Google visibility decline
3:37 - Google Ads Performance Max A/B experiments
4:48 - Google AI Mode bottom citations
7:05 - Conclusion

A daily recap video summarizing a few of the top search marketing headlines covered at the Search Engine Roundtable.

This recap is called It's New - A quick, daily dose of the latest in SEO with Anu Adegbola of Search Engine Land, Mordy Oberstein of SE Ranking and Greg Finn of Cypress North (and Marketing O’Clock) and Barry Schwartz.
